definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
the solar year/the year defined as the period between successive equinoxes
tropic/one of the two latitude lines, Tropic of Capricorn or Tropic of Cancer

sentences.english: The return of the Milu deer is a good example of friendship and cooperation between China and Britain.
sentences.chinese: 麋鹿回归是中英两国友谊和合作的一个很好的例子。

sentences.english: Before returning to PRC in 1997, HK was already doing very well compared to SG.
sentences.chinese: 1997年香港回归前，它已经比新加坡做得好了。

sentences.english: The anomalies of the political system have contributed to the governance crisis since the handover.
sentences.chinese: 畸型的政治制度造成回归后的管治危机。

sentences.english: As the bubble deflates, China's exports are normalizing.
sentences.chinese: 当泡沫消去，中国的出口亦回归正常化。

sentences.english: How to use SVM to solve the problem of curve smoothing reconstruction in reverse engineering is discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 论文研究用支持向量回归机处理光顺曲线的重构问题。

sentences.english: For me, I just pick up the kamancheh and I go back to ancient lands and history.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，我只是将古文化捡起，我重新回归历史。

sentences.english: We will never forget the day that HongKong returned.
sentences.chinese: 我们永远不会忘记香港回归祖国的那一天。

sentences.english: The Anfield boss believes the trio's return will keep everyone in his squad on their toes.
sentences.chinese: 贝帅相信三员大将的回归将给全队注入一针强心剂。

sentences.english: For a given sensor number, there would be an optimal autoregressivelength.
sentences.chinese: 对于不同阵元数都存在一个最佳回归长度。

sentences.english: We study the unstable autoregressive process for the first order with infinite variance.
sentences.chinese: 对具有无限方差的一阶自回归非平稳过程进行了研究。

sentences.english: In this paper, we propose to estimate abundances from hyperspectral image using support vector regression(SVR) method.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于支撑向量回归的高光谱混合像元自动分解。

sentences.english: Linear door handle and auto-return to open, humanistic design.
sentences.chinese: 直线式门拉手和开门自动回归，设计更具人性化。

sentences.english: Is your returned soul after long touring China.
sentences.chinese: 是您倦游中国后回归的灵魂。

sentences.english: Everything from the Tao to grow, and then return to the road.
sentences.chinese: 万物由道而生，循着道成长，而后又回归于道。

sentences.english: He once took advantage of his popularity to get back at a critic.
sentences.chinese: 他曾经利用他的声望回归到一个评论家的身份。

sentences.english: The critical condition of its dynamic recrystallization has been established by linear regression.
sentences.chinese: 建立了试验用钢的动态再结晶临界条件回归方程。

definition: to come back out of retirement/to get involved again after having withdrawn
to pick up (a theme etc)/to regain (confidence)/to revive (a custom, friendship etc)
to go on stage/fig. to appear on the scene/used in advertising to mean new product
separated in time (usu. followed by a quantity of time)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to reinstate/to resume/to restore/to recover/to regain/to rehabilitate
